original_title: Metallica: 40th Anniversary - Live at Chase Center (Night 1)
overview: Night 1 of 2, captured December 17th 2021 at a sold-out Chase Center in its hometown of San Francisco, Metallica celebrates its 40th anniversary with a career-spanning concert that puts into perspective the iconic metal bandâ€™s legacy, importance and influence.
title: Metallica: 40th Anniversary - Live at Chase Center (Night 1)
